title: Hierarchical file tree
description: Use build_file_tree() and flatten_tree() from git/file_tree.rs to display files in folder hierarchy instead of flat list.

title: Add README
description: Create README.md with installation instructions, screenshots, usage examples, and feature list.

title: Switch between PR commits
description: Allow navigating between commits in a PR. Comments are tied to specific commits - show which commit a comment references and let user view that commit's diff.

title: File selection loads diff
description: Clicking a file in the file tree should load that file's diff lines into the diff view. Currently only the first file is loaded on startup.

title: Support color themes
description: Add theme switching (solarized-light, solarized-dark, monokai, etc). Theme config in ui/theme.slint needs to be dynamic.

title: Show PR title in toolbar
description: When viewing a PR, display PrInfo.title in the toolbar instead of just PR #N.

title: Show PR comments from GitHub
description: Fetch and display PR review comments inline with diff using gh CLI. Show comment author, timestamp, and thread context.

title: Integrate syntax highlighting
description: Connect SyntaxHighlighter from highlighting/syntax.rs to diff view. Color code content based on file extension.

title: Keyboard navigation
description: Arrow keys to navigate file list, u/s to toggle unified/side-by-side view, Enter to select file.

title: Display hunk headers in diff view
description: Show @@ -X,Y +X,Y @@ separator lines between diff hunks. The DiffHunk.header field is already parsed but not rendered.
